text: Hans Karl Wilhelm Max Heinrich Sellschopp (16 April 1891, in Schwerin - 5 August 1978 in Bottighofen) was a German businessman and Nazi cultural officer at the Reichsmusikkammer, who worked as a concert promoter at Coventry Cathedral after World War II. He was later made Grand Commander of the Order of the Crown of Italy. ==References== Category:1891 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Mecklenburg-Vorpommern Category:Nazis Category:People from Schwerin
title: Hans Sellschopp
